participant_2.background:
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
my mom is a nurse.
and , my best friend is abigail.
one day i played the lottery.

content.text: I'm doing well. I'm just relaxing at home after a long day at work. I'm a writer and I spent most of my day working on my latest novel.
That's awesome! I'm a student and I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school. I miss being a kid sometimes.
I know what you mean. I miss being a kid too. But I think it's important to remember that being a kid is only temporary. We have to grow up and take on responsibilities eventually.
Yeah, you're right. I'm trying to focus on the future and make the most of my time in school.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to do great things.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to draw and paint. It's a great way for me to express myself and cope with the loss of my parents.
That's really cool. I love art too. I used to paint a lot when I was younger.
Have you ever thought about taking it up again?
I have thought about it, but I'm not sure if I have the time right now.
Well, if you ever do, I'd love to see your work.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
